feat(meeting-ai): add comprehensive testing scripts and documentation

- Add debug scripts for WebSocket connection testing
- Add backend audio test script for PCM16 audio streaming
- Add OpenAI Realtime mic test for direct API validation
- Add comprehensive documentation for real transcription implementation
- Add test fixtures for audio testing (24kHz mono PCM/WAV)
- Fix service name from meetingAI to meetingai for consistency
- Update dev script to include meetingai service
- Expand Claude settings auto-approval patterns

Changes:
- New scripts for WebSocket and audio testing
- Documentation of architecture, changes, and service name fix
- Test audio fixtures in tests/fixtures/audio/
- Service name normalization to lowercase convention
- Enhanced developer tooling for Meeting AI debugging

Testing:
- Server build completes successfully
- Service name now matches Outline convention (lowercase)
- Test scripts ready for WebSocket and audio validation
